room_title: Escape room "The Inventor's Garage" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: Inventors Garage is so much fun and easily achievable with just two people. The Rube Goldberg machine is a blast. Our group of made it out with 1:42 left

room_title: Escape room "The Inventor's Garage" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: This was my first escape room experience ever - and it was amazing! We tried the Inventor's Garage as a group of six. The puzzles were really fun and creative. The staff was super friendly, well organized, and accommodating. Can't wait to go back and try the other 3 rooms! Highly recommended.

room_title: Escape room "The Inventor's Garage" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: This is the third room we've escaped from at Epic Escape Game Englewood and this one was just as terrific as the last two. So far we've done The Inventor's Garage, Sweet Dreams and the Lost Continent, all with a different mix of people. I'm thoroughly impressed with the thoughtful design of each of the rooms and all of the puzzles are unique. The decorations in the room match the story lines perfectly. I've met both owners now and they're equally friendly and helpful. I highly recommend the escape room experience and Epic Escape Game in particular.

room_title: Escape room "The Inventor's Garage" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: This place is great! I had never done an escape room before and my sister suggested we do it for our dad's birthday the other day. We did the Inventor's Garage and got out within approximately 40 minutes. It was a great way to get those gears in our brains moving all while having fun. It was much more intricate of a set up than I thought it would be and I will definitely be going back.

room_title: Escape room "The Inventor's Garage" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: My friend & I had never done an escape room but this was a blast! Plus, the owners/staff were so friendly & answered all of our questions before & after. We will definitely go back again!

room_title: Escape room "The Inventor's Garage" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: So fun! Just had girls night out here! We had a blast! These guys did an awesome job making everything flow. The story was cute. The clues were perfect. It was fun to work together and bust out with 1:22 to spare! Will be back to try the other rooms! Thanks for the great time!
